boat.name: Minstrel
boat.full_description:
Owned from new by Anthony John (Gubby) Williams and Christine Alma (nee Thery) Williams, Minstrel was built to a commissioned design by A J Williams & R Feloy at Totnes.

She cruised to the Carribean 1991-2 then to Maine for three years returning to Southern Ireland in 1995 and was moored at Hare Island, Skibbern for several years.

Following a refit in 2008 she carries a Cornish Yard topsail, bigger in the hoist than the mainsail luff. Yard is aluminium but will be replaced by wood. She has cruised the western English Channel and circumnavigated Britian via Caledonian Canal, taking part in the OGA Round Britain Challenge in 2013.
boat.construction_details: Strip plank douglas fir on laminated iroko ring frames double diagonal marine ply planked and glassed
boat.short_description: Built at Totnes, Devon, to a commissioned design in 1991, Minstrel has cruised extensively in the Carribean, Maine, Southern Ireland and undertaken two circumnavigations of Britain.
